item.title: Introduction to Github for Beginners
item.description: What is Githubï¼Ÿ Git is a version control software, while Github is an online platform for storing code. It organizes projects into repositories, allowing users to use Git for version control and making collaboration within a team easier. Why Use Github In a project, I make changes to A, someone else modifies B, and I update C. Things can quickly get messy. It can store a large collection of your work portfolio.
